title: Sinner's Son
description: The long awaited prequel to the Savage Sons MC Series and the return of Moses Hall!  Maria Alvarez is a Juarez prostitute working for the brutal men of a Mexican cartel. She never knew her African American father who left her nothing but the bitter struggle of being a black woman in a society that values conformity. Dark-skinned and exotic, Maria is a single mom who dreams of a better life, but her life has been full of sorrow and disappointment.  When she meets sexy biker bad boy Moses Hall, her whole world is turned upside down. Will her night of passion with Moses lead to a better life … or more shattered dreams? Jayna King’s bestselling series concludes with this tale of love, passion, and heartbreaking loss. Secret sin, a quest for justice, and family ties that are put to the test … the final book about the Savage Sons Motorcycle Club Series takes you for a thrilling ride  Special Limited Time Discount Price -- Scroll Up and Click 'Buy Now' to Start Reading Today
author: Jayna King
